text: The Eiffel Tower is located in Paris.
The Great Wall of China is visible from space.
Python is a programming language loved by developers.
FastAPI is a high-performance Python web framework.
The sun rises in the east and sets in the west.
Mount Everest is the highest mountain in the world.
The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean on Earth.
Shakespeare wrote many famous plays and sonnets.
Leonardo da Vinci painted the Mona Lisa.
The human body has 206 bones.
The capital of Japan is Tokyo.
The Great Pyramid of Giza is one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
Albert Einstein developed the theory of relativity.
The speed of light is approximately 299,792 kilometers per second.
Water freezes at 0 degrees Celsius.
The Amazon rainforest is home to a diverse range of species.
Bees play a crucial role in pollination.
The internet was invented in the late 20th century.
Mars is known as the Red Planet.
Vincent van Gogh painted Starry Night.
The human brain contains about 86 billion neurons.
